attributes.action: to give me a written letter in person from the prime minister stating that i as a british citizen is allowed to go through public right of ways unchallenged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ask the prime minister to give me a letter stating that as a british citizen and as a strong believer of obeying the law that i and others are allowed to go through public rights of way and not being challenged by those who live in a public right of way and my school telling me i cannot go through public rights of way

rejection.details: Please write to the Prime Minister's Office directly. http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
